trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted"> </xref> evento o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class is an optional event that is raised only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A> property is explicitly set to a type other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>evento o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>classe é um evento opcional que é gerado apenas se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A>propriedade é definida explicitamente como um tipo diferente de `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> event is implemented to perform mask-specific and type-specific validation processing.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>evento é implementado para executar o processamento de validação específicas de tipo e de máscara.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, general validation is typically performed in the standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, a validação geral normalmente é executada em padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>evento definido na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>classe base.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>
